document_name: Supreme Decree No. 25.558 creating the Interinstitutional Council for Climate Change
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/BOL/1999/BOL-1999-10-22-Supreme Decree No. 25.558 creating the Interinstitutional Council for Climate Change_a0fbc1da388ada49ff7293429a75a160.pdf
document_description: This Decree creates the Inter-institutional Council for Climate Change (CICC), as an instance of dialogue and consultation of the social, governmental and non-governmental sectors, related to climate change. It is the responsibility of the CICC to deliberate and propose national policies and strategies for the implementation of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change.
